channel.title: Reading raw DAT Char files?
channel.description:
I recently swapped to a Solace base, wonderful base, nicely coded. However the problem i'm having is i've never had to deal with DAT files in my sources before, and all my character files are saved in a DAT format, does anyone know how i can read/edit these? To set player rights and what not?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Reading raw DAT Char files?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

They’re like that for a reason, if playerRights is your only concern, this can be done without viewing the character file.

Read full topic
